SELECT t.*, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'CRITICAL') as critical, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'HIGH') as high, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'MEDIUM') as medium, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'LOW') as low, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'UNKNOWN') as unknown FROM cloud_native_config_result t left join user u on t.apply_user = u.id
and LOWER(t.name) like CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{request.name}),'%')
and LOWER(u.name) like CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{request.userName}),'%')
ORDER BY t.update_time desc

SELECT t.*, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'CRITICAL') as critical, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'HIGH') as high, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'MEDIUM') as medium, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'LOW') as low, (select count(*) from cloud_native_config_result_item tj where tj.result_id = t.id and severity = 'UNKNOWN') as unknown FROM cloud_native_config_result t left join user u on t.apply_user = u.id
AND t.id = #{resultId}

SELECT * from ( (SELECT count(*) as critical FROM cloud_native_config_result_item t WHERE LOWER(t.severity) = 'critical' AND t.result_id = #{resultId}) as critical, (SELECT count(*) as high FROM cloud_native_config_result_item t WHERE LOWER(t.severity) = 'high' AND t.result_id = #{resultId}) as high, (SELECT count(*) as medium FROM cloud_native_config_result_item t WHERE LOWER(t.severity) = 'medium' AND t.result_id = #{resultId}) as medium, (SELECT count(*) as low FROM cloud_native_config_result_item t WHERE LOWER(t.severity) = 'low' AND t.result_id = #{resultId}) as low, (SELECT count(*) as unknown FROM cloud_native_config_result_item t WHERE LOWER(t.severity) = 'unknown' AND t.result_id = #{resultId}) as unknown, (SELECT count(*) as total FROM cloud_native_config_result_item t WHERE t.result_id = #{resultId}) as total )
